post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

Agreement.description: An agreement represents a contract or arrangement, either written or verbal and sometimes enforceable by law, such as a service level agreement or a customer price agreement. An agreement involves a number of other business entities, such as products, services, and resources and/or their specifications.

agreementPeriod.description: The time period during which the Agreement is in effect.

completionDate.description: Date at which the agreement is completed

description.description: Narrative that explains the agreement and details about the it , such as why the agreement is taking place.

documentNumber.description: A reference number assigned to an Agreement that follows a prescribed numbering system.

href.description: Unique url identifying the agreement as a resource

initialDate.description: Date at which the agreement was initialized

name.description: A human-readable name for the agreement

statementOfIntent.description: An overview and goals of the Agreement.

status.description: The current status of the agreement. Typical values are: in process, approved and rejected.

type.description: The type of the agreement. For example "commercial".

version.description: A string identifying the version of the agreement.

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing a resource (for type extension).

@baseType.description: The base type for use in polymorphic collections

AgreementSpecification.description: A template of an agreement that can be used when establishing partnerships.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the agreement specification is about.

id.description: Unique identifier of the agreement specification

isBundle.description: Indicates that this agreement specification is a grouping of other agreement specifications. The list of bundled agreement specifications is provided via the specificationRelationship property.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

validFor.description: The period for which the agreement specification is valid

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing a resource (for type extension).

@baseType.description: The base type for use in polymorphic collections

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

AgreementSpecificationRef.description: AgreementSpecification reference. An AgreementSpecification represents a template of an agreement that can be used when establishing partnerships.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the agreement specification is about.

href.description: Reference URL of the agreement specification

id.description: Unique identifier of the agreement specification

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

AgreementItem.description: A part of the agreement expressed in terms of a product offering and possibly including specific terms and conditions.

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

PartyRoleRef.description: Party role reference. A party role represents the part played by a party in a given context.

name.description: The name of the referred party role.

partyId.description: The identifier of the engaged party that is linked to the PartyRole object.

partyName.description: The name of the engaged party that is linked to the PartyRole object.

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

AgreementAuthorization.description: A business participant that is responsible for approving the agreement.

date.description: The date associated with the authorization state.

signatureRepresentation.description: Indication that represents whether the signature is a physical paper signature or a digital signature.

state.description: Current status of the authorization, for example in process, approved, rejected.

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

Characteristic.description: Describes a given characteristic of an object or entity through a name/value pair.

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing a resource (for type extension).

AgreementRef.description: Agreement reference. An agreement represents a contract or arrangement, either written or verbal and sometimes enforceable by law, such as a service level agreement or a customer price agreement. An agreement involves a number of other business entities, such as products, services, and resources and/or their specifications.

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

ProductOfferingRef.description: ProductOffering reference. A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

AgreementTermOrCondition.description: Aspects of the agreement not formally specified elsewhere in the agreement and that cannot be captured elsewhere in a formal notation, or automatically monitored and require a more human level of management.

description.description: Text that explains the term or condition of the agreement.

validFor.description: The period of time during which the term or condition of the agreement applies.

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

AgreementSpecCharacteristic.description: A characteristic quality or distinctive feature of an agreement.

configurable.description: If true, the Boolean indicates that the characteristic is configurable

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the characteristic is

name.description: Name of the characteristic being specified.

validFor.description: The period for which the specification characteristic is valid

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text and so forth

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing a resource (for type extension).

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

AgreementAttachment.description: Represents a complementary piece of information to describe the agreement. Could be a document, picture, a video or any kind of multimedia content.

type.description: Attachment type such as video, picture

url.description: Uniform Resource Locator, is a web page address (a subset of URI)

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

AgreementSpecificationRelationship.description: A relationship between agreement specifications. Typical relationships are substitution and dependency.

id.description: Unique identifier of the related agreement specification.

type.description: Type of relationship such as, substitution or dependency.

validFor.description: The period for which the relationship is valid

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

AgreementSpecCharacteristicValue.description: A number or text that can be assigned to an agreement specification characteristic.

default.description: Indicates if the value is the default value for a characteristic

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the characteristic, such as minutes, gigabytes (GB) and so on.

validFor.description: The period of time for which a value is applicable

value.description: A discrete value that the characteristic can take on

valueFrom.description: The low range value that a characteristic can take on

valueTo.description: The upper range value that a characteristic can take on

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth

@type.description: The class type of the actual resource (for type extension).

reason.description: Text that explains the reason for error.

message.description: (optional) Text that provide more details and corrective actions related to the error.

referenceError.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.

@type.description: (optional) The class type of a REST resource.

@schemaLocation.description: (optional) A link to the schema describing a REST resource.
